short_summary: Requirement is to acquire 2 item(s) for the CT114 for the DOD
description: The Request for Proposal (RFP) is open only to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.
full_summary:
# Procurement Opportunity - Aviation Replacement Parts
**Official Solicitation Number:** W8485-237142/A
**Closing Date:** November 28, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST

## Overview
The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) as part of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series for Aviation Replacement Parts. This requirement is for the acquisition of 2 items for the CT114 aircraft, managed by Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5-2-7-2.

## Eligibility
This solicitation is open to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series only. The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* JHT Defense Inc.
* Mills/Sterling Aerospace Inc.
* Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Canada West Avionics

## Instructions for Bidders
RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the invited SA Holders. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

## Contact Information
Inquiries regarding this RFP should be submitted to:

* Ryan Duncan, Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* 455, Boulevard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca

## Further Opportunities for Qualification
A notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

## Note
Please submit your request to become qualified to Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader, Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada, Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector, Civilian Aircraft Division, 455, Boulevard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7. Email: samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. During the COVID-19 pandemic, teleworking is in place, and the best way to contact us is by email. Please note that services may be unavailable on certain
